verses.verse: When <S%H3588><s%> thou goest <S%H3318>out<s%> to <S%H4421>battle<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> thine <S%H341>enemies,<s%> and <S%H7200>seest<s%> <S%H5483>horses,<s%> and <S%H7393>chariots,<s%> and a <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7227>more<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> thou, be not <S%H3372>afraid<s%> <S%H3808><s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> them: <S%H3588>for<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> is <S%H5973>with<s%> thee, which brought thee <S%H5927>up<s%> out of the <S%H4480>land<s%> <S%H776><s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

And it shall <S%H1961>be,<s%> when ye are come <S%H7126>nigh<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H4421>battle,<s%> that the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H5066>approach<s%> and <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%>

And shall <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> them, <S%H8085>Hear,<s%> O <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H859>ye<s%> <S%H7131>approach<s%> this <S%H3117>day<s%> unto <S%H4421>battle<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> your <S%H341>enemies:<s%> let <S%H408>not<s%> your <S%H3824>hearts<s%> <S%H7401>faint,<s%> <S%H3372>fear<s%> <S%H408>not,<s%> and do <S%H408>not<s%> <S%H2648>tremble,<s%> <S%H408>neither<s%> be ye <S%H6206>terrified<s%> because <S%H4480>of<s%> <S%H6440><s%> them;

For <S%H3588><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> is he that <S%H1980>goeth<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> you, to <S%H3898>fight<s%> for you <S%H5973>against<s%> your <S%H341>enemies,<s%> to <S%H3467>save<s%> you.

And the <S%H7860>officers<s%> shall <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H4310>What<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> is there <S%H834>that<s%> hath <S%H1129>built<s%> a <S%H2319>new<s%> <S%H1004>house,<s%> and hath <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H2596>dedicated<s%> it? let him <S%H1980>go<s%> and <S%H7725>return<s%> to his <S%H1004>house,<s%> <S%H6435>lest<s%> he <S%H4191>die<s%> in the <S%H4421>battle,<s%> and <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H2596>dedicate<s%> it.

And <S%H4310>what<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> is he <S%H834>that<s%> hath <S%H5193>planted<s%> a <S%H3754>vineyard,<s%> and hath <S%H3808>not<s%> yet <S%H2490>eaten<s%> of it? let him also <S%H1980>go<s%> and <S%H7725>return<s%> unto his <S%H1004>house,<s%> <S%H6435>lest<s%> he <S%H4191>die<s%> in the <S%H4421>battle,<s%> and <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H2490>eat<s%> of it.

And <S%H4310>what<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> is there <S%H834>that<s%> hath <S%H781>betrothed<s%> a <S%H802>wife,<s%> and hath <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H3947>taken<s%> her? let him <S%H1980>go<s%> and <S%H7725>return<s%> unto his <S%H1004>house,<s%> <S%H6435>lest<s%> he <S%H4191>die<s%> in the <S%H4421>battle,<s%> and <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H3947>take<s%> her.

And the <S%H7860>officers<s%> shall <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H3254>further<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> and they shall <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H4310>What<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> is there that is <S%H3373>fearful<s%> and <S%H7390>fainthearted?<s%> <S%H3824><s%> let him <S%H1980>go<s%> and <S%H7725>return<s%> unto his <S%H1004>house,<s%> <S%H3808>lest<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H251>brethren's<s%> <S%H3824>heart<s%> <S%H4549>faint<s%> as well as his <S%H3824>heart.<s%>

And it shall <S%H1961>be,<s%> when the <S%H7860>officers<s%> have made an <S%H3615>end<s%> of <S%H1696>speaking<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> that they shall <S%H6485>make<s%> <S%H8269>captains<s%> of the <S%H6635>armies<s%> to <S%H7218>lead<s%> the <S%H5971>people.<s%>
When <S%H3588><s%> thou comest <S%H7126>nigh<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> a <S%H5892>city<s%> to <S%H3898>fight<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> it, then <S%H7121>proclaim<s%> <S%H7965>peace<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> it.

And it shall <S%H1961>be,<s%> <S%H518>if<s%> it make thee <S%H6030>answer<s%> of <S%H7965>peace,<s%> and <S%H6605>open<s%> unto thee, then it shall <S%H1961>be,<s%> that <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> that is <S%H4672>found<s%> therein shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H4522>tributaries<s%> unto thee, and they shall <S%H5647>serve<s%> thee.

And <S%H518>if<s%> it will make no <S%H7999>peace<s%> <S%H3808><s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> thee, but will <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H4421>war<s%> <S%H5973>against<s%> thee, then thou shalt <S%H6696>besiege<s%> <S%H5921><s%> it:

And when the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> hath <S%H5414>delivered<s%> it into thine <S%H3027>hands,<s%> thou shalt <S%H5221>smite<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H2138>male<s%> thereof with the <S%H6310>edge<s%> of the sword: <S%H2719><s%>

But <S%H7535><s%> the <S%H802>women,<s%> and the little <S%H2945>ones,<s%> and the <S%H929>cattle,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H1961>is<s%> in the <S%H5892>city,<s%> even <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H7998>spoil<s%> thereof, shalt thou <S%H962>take<s%> unto thyself; and thou shalt <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H7998>spoil<s%> of thine <S%H341>enemies,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> hath <S%H5414>given<s%> thee.

Thus <S%H3651><s%> shalt thou <S%H6213>do<s%> unto <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5892>cities<s%> which are <S%H3966>very<s%> far <S%H7350>off<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> thee, <S%H834>which<s%> are <S%H3808>not<s%> of the <S%H4480>cities<s%> <S%H5892><s%> of <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1471>nations.<s%>

But <S%H7535><s%> of the <S%H4480>cities<s%> <S%H5892><s%> of <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> doth <S%H5414>give<s%> thee for an <S%H5159>inheritance,<s%> thou shalt save <S%H2421>alive<s%> <S%H3808>nothing<s%> <S%H3605><s%> that breatheth: <S%H5397><s%>

But <S%H3588><s%> thou shalt utterly <S%H2763>destroy<s%> <S%H2763><s%> them; namely, the <S%H2850>Hittites,<s%> and the <S%H567>Amorites,<s%> the <S%H3669>Canaanites,<s%> and the <S%H6522>Perizzites,<s%> the <S%H2340>Hivites,<s%> and the <S%H2983>Jebusites;<s%> <S%H834>as<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> hath <S%H6680>commanded<s%> thee:

That <S%H4616><s%> <S%H834><s%> they <S%H3925>teach<s%> you <S%H3808>not<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> after <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H8441>abominations,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> they have <S%H6213>done<s%> unto their <S%H430>gods;<s%> so should ye <S%H2398>sin<s%> against the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>

When <S%H3588><s%> thou shalt <S%H6696>besiege<s%> <S%H413><s%> a <S%H5892>city<s%> a <S%H7227>long<s%> <S%H3117>time,<s%> in making <S%H3898>war<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> it to <S%H8610>take<s%> it, thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H7843>destroy<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H6086>trees<s%> thereof by <S%H5080>forcing<s%> an <S%H1631>axe<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> them: <S%H3588>for<s%> thou mayest <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> them, and thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> cut them <S%H3772>down<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3588>(for<s%> the <S%H6086>tree<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> is <S%H120>man's<s%> life) to <S%H935>employ<s%> <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> them in the siege: <S%H4692><s%>

Only <S%H7535><s%> the <S%H6086>trees<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> thou <S%H3045>knowest<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H1931>they<s%> be <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H6086>trees<s%> for <S%H3978>meat,<s%> thou shalt <S%H7843>destroy<s%> and cut them <S%H3772>down;<s%> and thou shalt <S%H1129>build<s%> <S%H4692>bulwarks<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H1931><s%> <S%H6213>maketh<s%> <S%H4421>war<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> thee, <S%H5704>until<s%> it be <S%H3381>subdued.<s%>
